00038 QoccApplication::QoccApplication ( int &argc, char **argv, int _internal ) :
00039                 QApplication ( argc, argv, _internal ),
00040                 mySplash ( NULL )
00041 {
00042         //splashScreen(NULL);
00043         //splashFinish(mySplash,1000);
00044 }
00045 
00046 QoccApplication::~QoccApplication()
00047 {
00048         if ( mySplash )
00049         {
00050                 delete mySplash;
00051                 mySplash = NULL;
00052         }
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void QoccApplication::splashScreen ( const QPixmap &pixmap )
00057 {
00058         QPixmap* p = ( QPixmap* ) &pixmap;
00059         if ( p->isNull() )
00060         {
00061                 p = new QPixmap ( "images/qoccsplash.png" );
00062         }
00063         mySplash = new QSplashScreen ( *p, Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint );
00064         if ( mySplash )
00065         {
00066                 mySplash->show();
00067                 splashMessage ( tr ( "Initializing Application..." ), Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignTop );
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void QoccApplication::splashMessage ( const QString &message, int alignment, const QColor &color )
00072 {
00073         if ( mySplash )
00074         {
00075                 mySplash->showMessage ( message, alignment, color );
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void QoccApplication::splashFinish ( QWidget* widget, long millisecs )
00080 {
00081         if ( mySplash )
00082         {
00083                 msleep ( millisecs );
00084                 mySplash->finish ( widget );
00085                 delete mySplash;
00086                 mySplash = NULL;
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void QoccApplication::msleep ( unsigned long millisecs )
00091 {
00092         QMutex mutex;
00093         QWaitCondition waitCondition;
00094         mutex.lock();
00095         waitCondition.wait ( &mutex, millisecs );
00096         mutex.unlock();
00097 }
